mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gmair_machine.machine_efficient_filter_config (config_id, model_id, t_run, total_time, param_one, param_two, first_remind_threshold, second_remind_threshold, block_flag, create_time) VALUES (#{configId}, #{modelId}, #{tRun}, #{totalTime}, #{paramOne}, #{paramTwo}, #{firstRemindThreshold}, #{secondRemindThreshold}, #{blockFlag}, #{createAt})
mapper.select: SELECT c.model_id, m.model_name, m.model_code, c.t_run, c.total_time, c.param_one, c.param_two, c.first_remind_threshold, c.second_remind_threshold FROM gmair_machine.machine_efficient_filter_config c inner join gmair_machine.goods_model m on c.model_id = m.model_id WHERE c.block_flag = 0 AND m.block_flag = 0;
mapper.update:
UPDATE gmair_machine.machine_efficient_filter_config
total_time = #{totalTime},
param_one = #{paramOne},
param_two = #{paramTwo},
first_remind_threshold = #{firstRemindThreshold},
second_remind_threshold = #{secondRemindThreshold},
model_id = #{modelId}
